body_html: I agree with @yaroslavvb. Automating this sort of thing is a broad problem space that can be tackled in a variety of ways. We're open to feature requests in this area, but it helps when they're as specific as possible. Anyone with ideas like that, which could help TensorFlow improve, please feel free to open a new issue.

body: I agree with @yaroslavvb. Automating this sort of thing is a broad problem space that can be tackled in a variety of ways. We're open to feature requests in this area, but it helps when they're as specific as possible. Anyone with ideas like that, which could help TensorFlow improve, please feel free to open a new issue.
